title: Successful User Registration
description: User registration form works correctly. All fields are validated properly, and user receives confirmation email. Account is created successfully in the database.

title: Dashboard Loads Successfully
description: Dashboard page loads correctly with all widgets displaying proper data. Navigation menu works smoothly, and all charts render without errors. Performance is good with loading time under 2 seconds.

title: Search Functionality Works
description: Search feature returns accurate results. Filters work correctly, and results are displayed in a user-friendly format. Search is fast and responsive.
